title: Mystery Pecan Pie
requires: Several recipes for pie crust are in the “Desserts and Pastries < Pies” folder.  The pie crust recipe that I prefer is the one titled “Flaky Pie Dough” that uses both vegetable shortening and butter together.
ingredients: 1 (8-ounce) package of cream cheese, at room temperature
⅓ cup plus ¼ cup sugar (divided use in the recipe below)
4 eggs (divided use in the recipe below)
2 teaspoons vanilla (divided use in the recipe below)
instructions: Using a blender beat the softened cream cheese with ⅓ cup of sugar, 1 egg, 1 teaspoon vanilla, and the salt until the mixture is thick and creamy.  Spread this mixture in the bottom of a prepared pie crust and sprinkle the pecans on top then set aside.

Mix, by hand, the remaining 3 eggs, ¼ cup sugar, 1 teaspoon vanilla, and the corn syrup until the mixture is well blended.  Pour this mixture over the pecans carefully and slowly so as to not disturb the loose pecans too much.
Bake for 40 to 45 minutes; or, until the pie center is set.
Source:  Pecans Plus,  Taste, The  Morning News, .
